articles.author: Josh Campbell
articles.title: Ana Montes, American convicted of spying for Cuba, released from US federal prison after 20 years - CNN
articles.description: An American citizen convicted of spying for Cuba, Ana Montes, has been released from US federal prison in Fort Worth, Texas, according to Federal Bureau of Prison online records.
articles.content:
An American citizen convicted of spying for Cuba, Ana Montes, has been released from US federal prison in Fort Worth, Texas, according to Federal Bureau of Prison online records.
